name: Boulang√®re Potatoes
instructions:
Heat oven to 200C/fan 180C/gas 6. Fry the [INGREDIENT:5c1696fb:plural] and [INGREDIENT:306c0a0e:singular] sprigs in the oil until softened and lightly coloured (about 5 mins).
Spread a layer of [INGREDIENT:e1a1f0be:plural] over the base of a 1.5-litre oiled gratin dish. Sprinkle over a few [INGREDIENT:5c1696fb:plural] (see picture, above) and continue layering, finishing with a layer of [INGREDIENT:e1a1f0be:plural]. Pour over the stock and bake for 50-60 mins until the [INGREDIENT:e1a1f0be:plural] are cooked and the top is golden and crisp.
originalInstructions:
Heat oven to 200C/fan 180C/gas 6. Fry the onions and thyme sprigs in the oil until softened and lightly coloured (about 5 mins).
Spread a layer of potatoes over the base of a 1.5-litre oiled gratin dish. Sprinkle over a few onions (see picture, above) and continue layering, finishing with a layer of potatoes. Pour over the stock and bake for 50-60 mins until the potatoes are cooked and the top is golden and crisp.
